awake.awaken: bruh it's not that easy to reawake you know

descriptions.assassin: A class that specializes in dagger and speed. They deal high damage yet has low defenses.
descriptions.confirm: Are you sure about your choice? **You can't choose your class again after this.**
descriptions.embed: Click on the button of the class to see the information of it.
descriptions.fighter: A class that specializes on melee weapons. They have good damage output and good defenses.
descriptions.healer: A class that specializes on healing magic and providing attack buffs. Though they are very weak.
descriptions.mage: A class that specializes on magic base attacks, dealing high damage yet having low defenses such as healers.
descriptions.ranger: A class that specializes on ranged attacks.
descriptions.tanker: A class that specializes in defense, attracting magic beasts to themselves and protecting low defense allies.

chooseClass.twice: You cannot choose your class twice!

defaultEmbed.commands:
$t(constant:emojis:guild) **Statistics commands** $t(constant:emojis:guild)
`profile` | `inventory` | `top` | `guild`* | `title`

$t(constant:emojis:pvp) **Leveling commands** $t(constant:emojis:quest)
`gate` | `duel`* | `quest`* | `recover` | `add` | `equip` | `unequip`

$t(constant:emojis:shop) **Economy commands** $t(constant:emojis:shop)
`shop` | `buy` | `sell` | `open`* | `use` | `trade`* | `give`

$t(constant:emojis:blacksmith) **Working commands** $t(constant:emojis:blacksmith)
`chop`* | `mine`* | `craft`* | `blacksmith`*

$t(constant:emojis:gambling) **Gambling commands** $t(constant:emojis:gambling)
`lottery` | `slots`* | `blackjack` | `coinflip` | `dice`* | `threecards`

$t(constant:emojis:gold) ** More Golds** $t(constant:emojis:gold)
`vote` | `daily` | `weekly` | `redeem`* | `codes`
defaultEmbed.footer:
These * commands are not implemented yet.
Click on the button to see details.

commands.ADD: Distribute your stats points into stats.
commands.BUY:
Buy an item from shop
Use `\shop` to show the shop.
commands.CODES: Show your available codes (use `redeem` to claim rewards)
commands.COINFLIP: Bet your golds by flipping a coin
commands.CONFIG:
Configure your gate.
`stats` on will auto show stats each turn.
`logs` on will show logs each turn.
`ping` will auto ping you when its your turn.
commands.DAILY: Get $t(constant:emojis.gold), $t(constant:emojis.life potion) and $t(constant:emojis.mana potion) depending on your level and streak
commands.DONATOR:
Show the donator status
*(Only works in the $t(glossary:WHA))*
commands.DUEL: Fight with the mentioned hunter, the hunter who win the fight will get golds and exp
commands.EQUIP: Show your equipments or equip a new item
commands.GATE:
Open a gate to enter a dungeon
*`\guide`* to see more info
commands.GUILD:
Show your guild or the guild(server) you are playing in
Use `\guild help` to see more commands
commands.INVITE: Get the bot's invite link and support server link
commands.LOTTERY: Buy $t(constant:emojis.lottery ticket) Lottery tickets to join the lottery
commands.OPEN:
***Not developed yet***, Open a `box`
Boxes are got from quest, or bought in the shop
Use `\box` to see more info!
commands.PARTY:
The more the merrier! You can invite up to 5 people to your party, and do dungeons with them.
There's also party bonus in gate's rewards.

**Party leader**
`\party invite @user` - adds a user to the party
`\party kick @user` - removes a user from the party
`\party disband` - deletes the party
`\party give @user <loot id> <amount>` - to give the party member the mentioned loot
`\party create` - to create a new party
`\party transfer` - to transfer the leadership to another member
**Party member**
`\party leave` - to leave the current party
`\party info` - to shows information of the party  
`\party loots` - to shows the list of drops that the party have earned
commands.PROFILE: Show your profile or other hunter's profile
commands.QUEST: Show your current quest or your quest list
commands.RECOVER: Use `status recovery` got from daily quest
commands.REDEEM: Redeem some rewards from `codes` (Cannot redeem in beta)
commands.REFERRAL: Refer code for some rewards (might be delete soon)
commands.SHOP:
Show the shop
Use `\buy <item_name> [amount]` to buy an item from it
commands.STATS:
**Donator command**
Show your stats

If you need help with stats, you might wanna find `\help add` or `\help <whatever stats>`
commands.TITLE: Choose a title, use `\title` to see all titles
commands.TOP:
See the top hunter/guild/etc. in specified category
**Available categories:**
> **Server rankings:** `level`, `rank`, `golds` (up to 5 pages)
> **Global rankings:** `global rank`, `global level`, `global golds`, `shadows`, `guild`
commands.USE: Use consumable items from your inventory
commands.VOTE:
You can vote for **$t(glossary:SLS)** and **$t(glossary:WHA)** every 12 hours
This commands will show you the cooldowns and the link to vote.
__*REWARDS*__:
**$t(glossary:SLS)**
> 1 vote point (2 in the weekend)
> $t(constant:emojis.gold) **Golds** depending on your level
> **Life potions** | **Mana potion** depending on your level
> **Keys** depending on your rank
> **Status Recovery** - Only on weekend (Fri - Sun UTC)
**$t(glossary:WHA)**
> 3 vote points
commands.WEEKLY: Get $t(constant:emojis.gold) and $t(constant:emojis.random box) (boxes are not implemented yet)

help.footer: This is not what you looking for? Click on other suggestions below.

language.decline: Okay, I didn't change your language.
language.disclaimer:
This language is **NOT** translated by **$t(glossary:WHA)'s Staff**. **Are you sure about changing language?**.
If you have better translation, please contact us!
language.success: Your language has been changed to English.

reset.error: Something went wrong please reset again!
reset.warning: **WARNING!!!!!!** This process is irreversible, are you sure you want to reset your progress **{{mention}}**?

retry: Errr.. a lil fast. Re-attempt in a sec.

rule.ruleFooter: Breaking any rules above will result in getting banned and blacklisted!
rule.ruleOne: Do **NOT** trade/sell in-game currency/items for anything outside the **$t(glossary:WHA)**.
rule.ruleThree: Do **NOT** abuse or benefit from bugs. Report it directly to <#729245705578741842> [**$t(glossary:WHA)**]($t(constant:serverInvite))
rule.ruleTwo: Do **NOT** cheat on the bot by any form of automation ||*(self-bot, macros, etc.)*||
